name: humantest
description: Test Harness and GUI app for manual asset verification

scripts.clean: rm -fr ./build && cd ThunderBolt; npm run clean
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cd ThunderBolt; npm run build
scripts.dev-start: here=`pwd`; npm run build && cd ThunderBolt/electronMain; npm run package && cd $here; npm run start
scripts.dev-build: here=`pwd`; npm run build && cd ThunderBolt/electronMain; npm run package && cd $here; inchjs
scripts.gen-npm: npm run dev-build && tsccd ./build && npm run x-gen-npm
scripts.x-gen-npm: cd npm && rm ht-app index.js; ln -s ../ThunderBolt/electronMain/release-builds ht-app && ln -s ../build/ExchangeFlow.js index.js && documentation readme index.js --section=API

author: tremho
